channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned trolley in footpath, 13th May
item.description:
Appears to have been set on fire. Previously seen in the drive of 52 Pilley Lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Everest Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: National speed limit signs, facing wrong way, 13th May
item.description:
I see that this was reported back in January 2025, 5 months on still not fixed. .the national speed limit signs have been turned sideways. Therefore cars with sign recognition will not get picked up and will stay at 40mph Should be a simple job to unscrew, realign and tighten screws, best done in quiet hours though When is this planned to be fixed as it is a major road out of Cheltenham. ///ledge.tops.caged

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign plate is misaligned (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Traffic Light Syncing, 13th May
item.description:
Due to the number of lanes being reduced by traffic cones on Cheltenham Road, rush hour traffic is becoming a real issue for local residents on their commute. Please can the syncing of the traffic lights be reviewed to allow more cars through at a time for vehicles travelling Southbound (from Cleeve) from Cheltenham Road and turning right onto Hyde Lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Evesham Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working
